attributes.action: All MPs to be paid minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
All MP's to be paid minimum wage + expenses.

All MP's to live in council owned & provided properties within the London area for which they receive housing benefit.

All MP'sPay bedroom tax for any extra rooms. This would come directly from their wage and and not as expenses.

Only public transport receipts (not first class) are eligible as expenses.

Only supermarket/grocery receipts eligible as expenses.

No restaurant bills are eligible for expenses

No alcohol is eligible as expenses

No cleaning bills eligible as expenses
